h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - "Tiger Vanguard" (Kingdom of Sahali)
content: It will take him a moment to get to his feet afterward, but you’ll want to react fast and retaliate, and possibly Immobilize him, or there’s a good chance he’ll leap away and retreat before his next attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - "Tiger Vanguard" (Kingdom of Sahali)'.
The content is as follows:
It will take him a moment to get to his feet afterward, but you’ll want to react fast and retaliate, and possibly Immobilize him, or there’s a good chance he’ll leap away and retreat before his next attack.
